card.title: Description
card.content:
In this dialog you can ...
- open a project from your workspace. - search for a project name in your workspace.

guide.title: Open a project from your workspace

steps.step: Select a project from the list.
`Optional:` Check the text box under *Selected Project* to see if the selected name is displayed.

guide.title: Search for a project name in your workspace

steps.step: Type part of the project name in the first textbox.
Verify if the text box under 'Selected Project' displays the correct project.
